files.name: main.py
files.content:
import random


user_input = input("Your Choice ?  Rock , Paper or Scissor\n").lower()
options = ["rock", "paper", "scissor"]

computer_choice = random.choice(options)

print(f"\n\n**************************\nYour Choice : {user_input}")
print(f"Computer Choice : {computer_choice}\n**************************\n\n")


if (
    (user_input == "rock" and computer_choice == "scissor")
    or (user_input == "scissor" and computer_choice == "paper")
    or (user_input == "paper" and computer_choice == "rock")
):
    print("        You win !\n\n")

elif user_input == computer_choice:
    print("        Match Draw..\n\n")

else:
    print("        You Lost !\n\n")
